title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations

For Task A1, the response must describe the constitutional amendment that is most relevant to the Supreme Court case.

For Task A2, the response must explain how the actions taken by the federal government prior to accessing emails illustrate the protection of a constitutional liberty.

For Task B, the response must explain how passage of the CLOUD Act reflects a tension between balancing order and security in the American political system.

For Task C1, the response must describe the section of the Constitution that grants the power used by Congress in the scenario to pass the CLOUD Act.

For Task C2, the response must explain how it reflects the principle of checks and balances in this scenario.
